https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wnYapkRi81HUs6T4QTx5exWKMxg.jpg In this documentary a group of boys is "isolated" for five days in a fully equipped house, with food, games, beds, toys etc. They are closely followed by a camera crew. Boys Alone
